divs: Sighting Detailsi was sitting on my bed with my dog bored trying to figure out what to write for my university assigenment when my dog freaked out and cowered under my desk. the was a fuzzy static noise that soon started. i was concerned so i opened my curtans and saw 3 consecutive flashes in the sky that looked like lightening but couldnt have been because it was a clear night, the first was directly south,SEeast, the next was exsactly 38 seconds later in the same postion then again another 38 seons later in the same spot again. after the 3rd flash the static fuzz noise dissapared.
Summary: 3 flashing lights in sky like lightening on clear night static noise made dog his and we herself
